original: de dag ni shing ljon pa dang nor bu @37b la brten te /
analyzed: de dag ni shing ljon pa dang nor bu @37b la brten te /
translated: They are supported by trees and jewels

original: de dag gi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi rjes su byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they conform to them.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rten 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang zhes bya ba la /
translated: Even though the great elements that are the basis of nonindicative form cease,

original: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyin chad 'das pa'i rgyu las 'byung //
analyzed: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyin chad 'das pa'i rgyu las 'byung //
translated: nonindicative form belonging to the desire realm arises from past causes after the first moment.

original: zhes 'byung bas rten gyi 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rjes su 'jug pa yin gyi /
analyzed: zhes 'byung bas rten gyi 'byung ba chen po dag 'gags kyang 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rjes su 'jug pa yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, even though the great elements that are its basis cease, nonindicative form belonging to the desire realm continues.

original: grib ma dang 'od dag ni de ltar rten 'gags pas mi 'gag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: grib ma dang 'od dag ni de ltar rten 'gags pas mi 'gag pa ma yin no //
translated: But shadows and light do not continue when their basis ceases.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i shing ljon pa la grib ma nyid dang zhes gang smras pa de ni lan ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i shing ljon pa la grib ma nyid dang zhes gang smras pa de ni lan ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the statement that nonindicative form is like a tree with its shadow is not a proper response.

original: gzhan dag gis ni 'di la zhes bya ba ni slob dpon nyid de /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis ni 'di la zhes bya ba ni slob dpon nyid de /
translated: Others say that this is not so.

original: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag gzugs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di la'o //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag gzugs nyid du thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di la'o //
translated: The consequence that the eye consciousness and so on would be form is in regard to this.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: This is taught:

original: gal te rten gzugs su yod pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ltar gzugs nyid yin na ni de lta na de'i rten gzugs su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gal te rten gzugs su yod pa'i phyir mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa dag kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ltar gzugs nyid yin na ni de lta na de'i rten gzugs su yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If the eye consciousness and so on were form because their support is form, like nonindicative form, then in that case, because their support would not be form,

original: 'ga' zhig gzugs nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'ga' zhig gzugs nyid ma yin par yang 'gyur na /
translated: some would not be form.

original: gcig la chos phan tshun 'gal ba'i 'du ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gcig la chos phan tshun 'gal ba'i 'du ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But it is not that mutually contradictory phenomena are combined in one thing,

original: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa bzhin no //
translated: like permanence and impermanence.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de ltar rten tha dad du gyur pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de ltar rten tha dad du gyur pa ma yin te /
translated: Nonindicative form does not have a different support in that way.

original: 'o na ci zhe na ;
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na ;
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: thams cad gzugs su yod pa yin no //
analyzed: thams cad gzugs su yod pa yin no //
translated: All of it exists as form.

original: de lta bas na 'dra bas thal ba med do //
analyzed: de lta bas na 'dra bas thal ba med do //
translated: Therefore, the consequence that it is similar is not established.

original: phung po rnam par gzhag pa'i mjug thogs su khams dang skye mched rnam par gzhag pa'i rig pa las 'das te /
analyzed: phung po rnam par gzhag pa'i mjug thogs su khams dang skye mched rnam par gzhag pa'i rig pa las 'das te /
translated: After the presentation of the aggregates, the presentation of the elements and bases is omitted,

original: tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid ma bstan pa kho nar /üîΩdbang don de dag kho na la //
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa'i phung po'i mtshan nyid ma bstan pa kho nar / dbang don de dag kho na la //
translated: and the characteristics of the aggregates of feeling and so on are not explained.

original: skye mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod //
analyzed: skye mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod //
translated: The ten elements and ten bases are considered to be just those sense faculties and objects.

original: ces gzugs kyi phung po'i skye mched dang / khams rnam par gzhag pa smos pa ni bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ces gzugs kyi phung po'i skye mched dang / khams rnam par gzhag pa smos pa ni bde blag tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The presentation of the form aggregate as the sense base and element is mentioned for the sake of easy explanation.

original: de dag kho na zhes bya ba ni gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don lnga dang zhes bya ba gang dag gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin du bstan pa dag go //
analyzed: de dag kho na zhes bya ba ni gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don lnga dang zhes bya ba gang dag gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin du bstan pa dag go //
translated: Just those means just those that were taught to be the nature of the form aggregate, namely, the five sense faculties and five objects.

original: dbang po rnams dang don rnams ni dbang don no //
analyzed: dbang po rnams dang don rnams ni dbang don no //
translated: The sense faculties and objects are the sense faculties and objects.

original: yid kyi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po dag dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba tshor ba la sogs pa don rnams gzhan dang gzhan yang yod pa de'i phyir de dag kho na la zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩgzugs @38a * //
analyzed: yid kyi dbang po la sogs pa dbang po dag dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba tshor ba la sogs pa don rnams gzhan dang gzhan yang yod pa de'i phyir de dag kho na la zhes bya ba smos so // gzugs @38a * //
translated: The faculties such as the mental faculty, and the objects such as feeling that are known by the mental consciousness, are other than the faculties and forms. Therefore, he says, ‚Äúonly those‚Äù .

original: kyi phung po dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kyi phung po dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The form aggregate is the form base and the form element.

original: gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas so /
analyzed: gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas so /
translated: Form is the five faculties, etc.

original: de'i skye mched dang / khams rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de'i skye mched dang / khams rnam par gzhag pa bshad zin to zhes bya ba la /
translated: The presentation of its base and element has been explained.

original: de'i ste gzugs kyi phung po'i'o /
analyzed: de'i ste gzugs kyi phung po'i'o /
translated: Its means of the form aggregate.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How?

original: gong ma bzhin no //
analyzed: gong ma bzhin no //
translated: As above.

original: gal te rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag par bya dgos pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched dang khams rnam par gzhag par bya dgos pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the presentation of the form base and element of non-indicative form is not necessary,

original: bya dgos pa bden mod kyi /
analyzed: bya dgos pa bden mod kyi /
translated: it is true that it is necessary.

original: drungs pa gcig ma brdas pas zhing ma brdas pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: drungs pa gcig ma brdas pas zhing ma brdas pa zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not like the case of an unploughed field, where the ploughing is not done because one part has not been ploughed.

original: chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i skye mched dang khams ni phyi nas rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i skye mched dang khams ni phyi nas rnam par 'jog par 'gyur ro //
translated: The base and element of the imperceptible form of the phenomena base will be explained later.üîΩThe other aggregates are feeling,

original: tshor ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la /üîΩ'dus byas chos rnams de dag ni //
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la / 'dus byas chos rnams de dag ni //
translated: perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga //üîΩzhes bshad pa de la /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga // zhes bshad pa de la /
translated: The aggregates are the five beginning with form.

original: gzugs kyi phung po ni bshad zin to //üîΩda ni tshor ba la sogs pa dag brjod par bya'o ;
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po ni bshad zin to // da ni tshor ba la sogs pa dag brjod par bya'o ;
translated: The form aggregate has already been explained.

original: / tshor ba myong ba zhes bya ba la /üîΩnyams su myong ba ni myong ba'o //
analyzed: / tshor ba myong ba zhes bya ba la / nyams su myong ba ni myong ba'o //
translated: Now the others, beginning with feeling, will be explained.üîΩFeeling is the experience of an object.

original: yul dang mthun par nyams su myong ba ni myong ba ste /
analyzed: yul dang mthun par nyams su myong ba ni myong ba ste /
translated: Experience is the experience of an object.üîΩIt is the experience of an object in accordance with its nature.

original: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo sim pa dang / nye bar gdung ba dang / rnam pa de gnyis ka las rnam bar grol ba mngon sum du byed pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang gi ngo bo sim pa dang / nye bar gdung ba dang / rnam pa de gnyis ka las rnam bar grol ba mngon sum du byed pa'o //
translated: It is the direct experience of the nature of an object, whether pleasant, painful, or neither of those two.

original: yang na nyams su myong bar byed pas na myong ba'o //
analyzed: yang na nyams su myong bar byed pas na myong ba'o //
translated: Or, it is called experience because it experiences.

original: de yang rang bzhin tha dad pa las rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de yang rang bzhin tha dad pa las rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: The three feelings are also derived from three different natures.

original: de la lus dang sems 'phel bar 'jug pa ni bde ba'o //
analyzed: de la lus dang sems 'phel bar 'jug pa ni bde ba'o //
translated: Among them, pleasant feeling is the experience of the body and mind being nourished.üîΩUnpleasant feeling is the experience of the body and mind being injured.

original: 'grib par 'jug pa ni sdug bsngal lo //üîΩgang zhig gnyis yang mi 'jug la /üîΩyod pa'i myong ba de ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'grib par 'jug pa ni sdug bsngal lo // gang zhig gnyis yang mi 'jug la / yod pa'i myong ba de ni bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin te /
translated: Neutral feeling is the experience of neither nourishment nor injury.

original: gnag ba yang ma yin dkar ba yang ma yin pa'i las bzhin no //
analyzed: gnag ba yang ma yin dkar ba yang ma yin pa'i las bzhin no //
translated: The feeling that is neither pleasant nor unpleasant is the experience of neither nourishment nor injury, like a karma that is neither black nor white.

original: rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba las ni rnam pa drug ste /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyi dbye ba las ni rnam pa drug ste /
translated: From the point of view of the different causes, there are six kinds of feeling.

original: mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa dang gsum tshogs pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa yin la /
analyzed: mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa dang gsum tshogs pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa yin la /
translated: The contact of the eye is the coming together of three factors: the eye, a visible object, and visual consciousness.

original: de las skyes pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'o //
analyzed: de las skyes pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'o //
translated: The feeling that arises from that is the feeling that arises from the contact of the eye.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //üîΩ'du shes ni /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o // 'du shes ni /
translated: The same should be understood for the contact of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Perception is the grasping of the mark.

original: zhes bya ba la rgyu mtshan ni khyad par te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la rgyu mtshan ni khyad par te /
translated: The reason is the distinction.

original: bdag nyid rang bzhin dang / rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs dag go //
analyzed: bdag nyid rang bzhin dang / rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba ni rnam grangs dag go //
translated: The words ‚Äúitself,‚Äù ‚Äúnature,‚Äù and ‚Äúown-nature‚Äù are synonyms.

original: 'di skad du @38b khyad par 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ni zhes bshad par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad du @38b khyad par 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin ni zhes bshad par 'gyur te /
translated: This is what is being said: The nature of the grasping of a distinction.

original: dper na bud med ni bu skyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: dper na bud med ni bu skyed par byed pa'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, a woman is the nature of giving birth to a child.

original: 'du shes ni chos dang sems kyi khyad par la brten te 'jug pa'i phyir na sngon po dang / ser po dang / ring po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di tsam zhig dper brjod do //
analyzed: 'du shes ni chos dang sems kyi khyad par la brten te 'jug pa'i phyir na sngon po dang / ser po dang / ring po dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di tsam zhig dper brjod do //
translated: Since perception occurs in dependence on the distinction of an object and mind, only ‚Äúblue,‚Äù ‚Äúyellow,‚Äù ‚Äúlong,‚Äù and ‚Äúshort‚Äù are mentioned as examples.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes la gnyis /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes la gnyis /
translated: The perception of contact through the coming together of the eye is twofold.

original: dper brjod pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs gzugs kyi skye mched kyi rab tu dbye ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dper brjod pa ni kha dog dang dbyibs gzugs kyi skye mched kyi rab tu dbye ba ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /
translated: The example is mentioned in order to show that the distinction of the form base is not the distinction of color and shape.

original: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan la yang sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: The same should be applied to the others.

original: de yang dbye na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: de yang dbye na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: That is also twofold, etc.

original: mig la sogs pa rkyen gyis byas pa'i dbye ba drug go //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rkyen gyis byas pa'i dbye ba drug go //
translated: The aggregate of formation is sixfold, classified according to the six sense faculties such as the eye.

original: tshor ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: tshor ba bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
translated: Like feeling.

original: dper na tshor ba'i phung po rten gyi dbye bas drug tu phye ba de bzhin du 'du shes kyi phung po yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'du shes nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'du shes zhes bya ba'i bar drug
analyzed: dper na tshor ba'i phung po rten gyi dbye bas drug tu phye ba de bzhin du 'du shes kyi phung po yang mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'du shes nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i 'du shes zhes bya ba'i bar drug
translated: Just as the aggregate of feeling is classified as sixfold according to the sense faculty that is its basis, so too the aggregate of discernment is classified as sixfold, from discernment arising from eye contact to discernment arising from mind contact.

original: tu dbye'o // tshogs kyi sgra ni re re zhing rdzas du ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tu dbye'o // tshogs kyi sgra ni re re zhing rdzas du ma yin par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The term aggregate indicates that each is a collection of many substances.

original: gal te yul gyi khyad par 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni thogs pa'i reg pa rnam par rtog pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan par ji ltar rung zhe na /
analyzed: gal te yul gyi khyad par 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa ni thogs pa'i reg pa rnam par rtog pa med pa dang mtshungs par ldan par ji ltar rung zhe na /
translated: If discernment is the apprehension of the specific characteristics of objects, how could it be associated with impeded contact that is nonconceptual?

original: 'du shes ni sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan te /
analyzed: 'du shes ni sa mang po pa yin pa'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa thams cad dang mtshungs par ldan te /
translated: Discernment is associated with all consciousnesses because it is a universal mental factor, like feeling.

original: thogs pa'i reg pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa na /
analyzed: thogs pa'i reg pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa na /
translated: When it is associated with the contact that is resistant,

original: g-yeng ba ma yin phyir zhes pas na de la bya ba mngon par gsal bar mi 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: g-yeng ba ma yin phyir zhes pas na de la bya ba mngon par gsal bar mi 'gyur gyi /
translated: it is not distracted, and therefore its activity of manifesting does not occur.

original: g-yeng ba'i phyir tshig bla dags kyi reg pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni de'i bya ba mngon par gsal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par ro //
analyzed: g-yeng ba'i phyir tshig bla dags kyi reg pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa la ni de'i bya ba mngon par gsal bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di ni khyad par ro //
translated: But when it is associated with the contact that is nominal, its activity of manifesting does occur, because it is distracted. This is the difference.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dus su rgyu mtshan ma bzung bas ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas nges par rtogs par mi nus te /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dus su rgyu mtshan ma bzung bas ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas nges par rtogs par mi nus te /
translated: When the objective condition is not grasped at the time of visual consciousness, it cannot be ascertained by mental consciousness,

original: de drangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de drangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has already disappeared.

original: de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin te /
translated: If it were not so,

original: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzugs la sogs pa la dngos su 'jug na ni long ba yang long ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te dbang po'i rnam par shes pa med par yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzugs la sogs pa la dngos su 'jug na ni long ba yang long ba ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: if mental consciousness were to engage directly in form, etc., without the visual consciousness, then even the blind would not be blind.

original: de'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du 'du shes kyang reg pa tha dad pa la tha dad par mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de'i phyir tshor ba bzhin du 'du shes kyang reg pa tha dad pa la tha dad par mi 'gal lo //
translated: Therefore, like feeling, perception also does not contradict the fact that it is different from the different contacts.

original: 'du byed phung po gzhi las gzhan //üîΩzhes bya ba la /üîΩgang dag ji skad du bshad pa gsum dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i phung @39a * //
analyzed: 'du byed phung po gzhi las gzhan // zhes bya ba la / gang dag ji skad du bshad pa gsum dang 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rnam par shes pa'i phung @39a * //
translated: The aggregate of formations is what is other than those and the basis.

original: po las gzhan pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed de dag ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
analyzed: po las gzhan pa mtshungs par ldan pa dang mi ldan pa'i 'du byed de dag ni 'du byed kyi phung po'o //
translated: The aggregate of formations is what is other than the three aggregates that have been explained and the aggregate of consciousness that will be explained, and it is the formations that are associated and not associated with the mind.

original: ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma bstan par bzhi las gzhan zhes brjod ce na /üîΩ'dus byas chos rnams de dag ni //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam par shes pa'i phung po ma bstan par bzhi las gzhan zhes brjod ce na / 'dus byas chos rnams de dag ni //
translated: How can it be said that the aggregate of consciousness is other than the four that have been explained, since it is said that:üîΩAll conditioned dharmas are the five aggregates:

original: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa phung po lnga //
translated: form, etc.

original: zhes rnam par shes ba sngar bstan zin pas nyes pa 'di ni med do //
analyzed: zhes rnam par shes ba sngar bstan zin pas nyes pa 'di ni med do //
translated: Since consciousness is mentioned first, this error does not occur.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo la sogs pas ni lung dang 'gal ba spong ngo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo la sogs pas ni lung dang 'gal ba spong ngo //
translated: The objection that the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika system contradicts the scriptures is refuted.

original: mdo las ni 'du byed kyi phung po gang zhe na /
analyzed: mdo las ni 'du byed kyi phung po gang zhe na /
translated: The s≈´tras say, What is the aggregate of formations?

original: sems pa'i tshogs drug go zhes gsungs la /
analyzed: sems pa'i tshogs drug go zhes gsungs la /
translated: It is the group of six intentions.

original: kha cig mdo 'di la brten nas 'du byed kyi phung po ni sems pa kho na yin no snyam du sems te /
analyzed: kha cig mdo 'di la brten nas 'du byed kyi phung po ni sems pa kho na yin no snyam du sems te /
translated: Some think that the aggregate of formations is only volition, based on this s≈´tra.

original: de dag la mdo 'di ni dgongs pa can yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dag la mdo 'di ni dgongs pa can yin no zhes bshad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to explain to them that this s≈´tra has a special intention,

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo las zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: the root text says, ‚ÄúThe BhagavƒÅn said in a s≈´tra . . .‚Äù

original: yang ci'i phyir /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag kyang khams rnam par gzhag par mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar ro zhes bstan pa nyid de /
analyzed: de dag kyang khams rnam par gzhag par mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar ro zhes bstan pa nyid de /
translated: And those are presented as the elements, as stated in the root text: ‚ÄúThe eye-consciousness element up to the mind consciousness element.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung pos ma bsdus pa yid kyi khams yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes snying la bzhag nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung pos ma bsdus pa yid kyi khams yod pa ma yin pa nyid do zhes snying la bzhag nas /
translated: Therefore, since the mind element is not included in the consciousness aggregate, it does not exist.

original: yang de dag las gzhan pa yid kyi khams de dag gang yin pa zhes 'dri ste /
analyzed: yang de dag las gzhan pa yid kyi khams de dag gang yin pa zhes 'dri ste /
translated: With this in mind, the root text asks, ‚ÄúWhat is that other mind element that is different from those?‚Äù

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po de dag las zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams drug po de dag las zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúfrom among those six consciousness elements‚Äù is that it is different from those six consciousness elements.

original: drug po 'das ma thag ba yi //üîΩzhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
analyzed: drug po 'das ma thag ba yi // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba la /
translated: The immediately preceding of the six.

original: @41a * // thag pa smos pa ni bar dang bcas pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: @41a * // thag pa smos pa ni bar dang bcas pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúimmediately preceding‚Äù is stated in order to exclude that which is separated by an interval.

original: 'das pa smos pa ni ma 'ongs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: 'das pa smos pa ni ma 'ongs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i don du'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúpast‚Äù is stated in order to exclude the future.

original: rnam par shes pa smos ba ni 'das ma thag ba'i tshor ba la sogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smos ba ni 'das ma thag ba'i tshor ba la sogs pa rnam par gcad par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúconsciousness‚Äù is stated in order to exclude the immediately past feeling, etc.

original: ni smos pa ni rnam par shes pa drug las de ma thag tu 'das pa kho na yin gyi /
analyzed: ni smos pa ni rnam par shes pa drug las de ma thag tu 'das pa kho na yin gyi /
translated: The term ‚Äúof‚Äù is stated in order to determine that the immediately past is only that which is immediately past from among the six consciousnesses.

original: de las tha dad ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par gzung ba'i don du'o //
analyzed: de las tha dad ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhes nges par gzung ba'i don du'o //
translated: It is not something separate from that.

original: gang smos pa ni gang dang gang de ma thag tu 'das pa zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: gang smos pa ni gang dang gang de ma thag tu 'das pa zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: The term ‚Äúthat‚Äù is stated in order to indicate that which is immediately past.

original: de dang de ni yod do zhes bya bar khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang de ni yod do zhes bya bar khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
translated: One should understand that it exists as that.

original: 'dir 'das ma thag pa ni rigs mthun pa'i skad cig mas chod pa yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dir 'das ma thag pa ni rigs mthun pa'i skad cig mas chod pa yin gyi /
translated: Here, the immediately past is interrupted by a moment of the same type.

original: rigs mi mthun pas chod ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pas chod ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not interrupted by a dissimilar type,

original: de ltar na 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba'i sems la yang yod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba'i sems la yang yod pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: because in that case it would exist even in the mind that arises from the meditative attainment of cessation.

original: dper na bu de nyid gzhan gyi par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
analyzed: dper na bu de nyid gzhan gyi par 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ;
translated: For example, the very same son becomes another's son, etc.

original: bu de nyid dus dang gnas skabs kyis chod pa na gnas kyi phar 'gyur la /
analyzed: bu de nyid dus dang gnas skabs kyis chod pa na gnas kyi phar 'gyur la /
translated: The very same son, when interrupted by time and circumstances, becomes another's son.

original: 'bras bu de nyid dus dang gnas skabs kyis chod pa na gzhan gyi sa bon yin pa lta bu ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu de nyid dus dang gnas skabs kyis chod pa na gzhan gyi sa bon yin pa lta bu ste /
translated: The very same effect, when interrupted by time and circumstances, becomes another's seed.

original: sems yod pa dang sems med ba dag la de mthong bas gnyis dper brjod do //
analyzed: sems yod pa dang sems med ba dag la de mthong bas gnyis dper brjod do //
translated: Since this is seen in both the presence and absence of mind, two examples are given.

original: de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan la brten pa nyid dus gnas skabs kyis chod pa na gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa gzhan la brten pa nyid dus gnas skabs kyis chod pa na gzhan gyi rten du 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, when the basis of the other consciousnesses such as eye consciousness is interrupted by time and circumstances, it becomes the basis of another.

original: de lta yin dang / de nyid ston pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa yin la /
analyzed: de lta yin dang / de nyid ston pa yin pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa yin la /
translated: If that is so, it is consciousness because it is taught to be that.

original: rten yin pa'i phyir yid yin no zhes bya bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rten yin pa'i phyir yid yin no zhes bya bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is established that the mind is the support.

original: de lta 'o na ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de lta 'o na ni zhes bya ba rgya cher 'byung ngo //
translated: If that is so, then there would be too many or too few elements, he says.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: de'i phyir / rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang / yid kyi khams rnams gcig gi nang du gcig 'dus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / rnam par shes pa'i khams drug dang / yid kyi khams rnams gcig gi nang du gcig 'dus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore he says, because the six elements of consciousness and the mind element are included in one another.

original: grangs bsgrub pa ni don gyi dbang gis 'gyur na /
analyzed: grangs bsgrub pa ni don gyi dbang gis 'gyur na /
translated: If the number of elements is established according to the meaning of the term,

original: de la gal te yid kyi khams drug gi nang du 'dus so zhes bya ba yin na ni /
analyzed: de la gal te yid kyi khams drug gi nang du 'dus so zhes bya ba yin na ni /
translated: then if the six consciousness elements are included in the mind element,

original: de lta na yid kyi khams ma gtogs pa gzhan khams bcu bdun rdzas su yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na yid kyi khams ma gtogs pa gzhan khams bcu bdun rdzas su yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: then, except for the mind element, the other seventeen elements would be substantial.

original: ci ste rnam par shes pa'i khams dag yid kyi khams kyi nang du 'du na ni de ltan gzugs can bcu dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams zhes bya ba bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste rnam par shes pa'i khams dag yid kyi khams kyi nang du 'du na ni de ltan gzugs can bcu dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams zhes bya ba bcu gnyis su 'gyur ro //
translated: But if the consciousness elements are included in the mind element, then there would be twelve elements: the ten physical elements, the mind element, and the entity element.

original: de lta 'ang yin @41b mod kyi zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de lta 'ang yin @41b mod kyi zhes bya ba la /
translated: Even though that is so, he says.

original: dngos su na don dam par de ltar bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis yod mod kyi /
analyzed: dngos su na don dam par de ltar bcu bdun nam bcu gnyis yod mod kyi /
translated: In fact, there are seventeen or twelve elements in the ultimate sense.

original: 'on kyang rten dang brten pa'i dbye bas phye nas /
analyzed: 'on kyang rten dang brten pa'i dbye bas phye nas /
translated: However, they are divided into two categories, basis and based,

original: drug pa'i rten ni rab sgrub phyir //
analyzed: drug pa'i rten ni rab sgrub phyir //
translated: in order to establish the basis of the sixth.

original: khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod de /
analyzed: khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod de /
translated: The eighteen elements are accepted

original: gang gi phyir ji ltar rnam par shes pa rnams dmigs ba med na skye bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rten med na yang yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji ltar rnam par shes pa rnams dmigs ba med na skye bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du rten med na yang yin la /
translated: because, just as consciousness does not arise without an object, it also does not arise without a basis.

original: drug pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ni ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams la mig la sogs pa ltar rten gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: drug pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la ni ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa rnams la mig la sogs pa ltar rten gzhan yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But unlike the consciousnesses of the eye, etc., which have a basis such as the eye, etc., the sixth consciousness, i.e., mental consciousness, has no other basis.

original: de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi khams bstan to //
analyzed: de'i phyir yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rten rab tu bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir yid kyi khams bstan to //
translated: Therefore, the mind element is taught in order to establish the basis of the mental consciousness element.

original: yang ji ltar 'gags zin pa da ltar ba'i rten du brjod /
analyzed: yang ji ltar 'gags zin pa da ltar ba'i rten du brjod /
translated: But how can the past be called the basis of the present?

original: da ltar ba'i rten ni da ltar ba kho na yin par mthong ste /
analyzed: da ltar ba'i rten ni da ltar ba kho na yin par mthong ste /
translated: The basis of the present is seen to be only present.

original: dper na myu gu la sogs pa rnams kyis yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: dper na myu gu la sogs pa rnams kyis yin pa bzhin no zhe na /
translated: For example, it is like the case of the sprout.

original: rigs te / de skye ba la nye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //üîΩji ltar gzugs yod kyang mig med par de'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba de bzhin du yul rnams yod kyang /
analyzed: rigs te / de skye ba la nye ba'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro // ji ltar gzugs yod kyang mig med par de'i rnam par shes pa mi skye ba de bzhin du yul rnams yod kyang /
translated: This is reasonable, because it is the cause that is proximate to the arising of the sprout.üîΩJust as visual consciousness does not arise in the absence of eyes, even when form is present,

original: rnam par shes pa snga ma 'dus pa med par rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi 'byung ngo /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa snga ma 'dus pa med par rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi 'byung ngo /
translated: in the same way, visual consciousness does not arise in the absence of the prior convergence of the object and the sense faculty, even when the object is present.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For this very reason,

original: 'gags ma thag pa zhes brjod kyi /
analyzed: 'gags ma thag pa zhes brjod kyi /
translated: it is called the ‚Äúimmediately preceding condition.‚Äù

original: ches sngar 'gags pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ches sngar 'gags pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not the condition that is very far removed,

original: des go phyir yang de mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des go phyir yang de mi skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not generate consciousness when it is very far removed.

original: de'i phyir 'di ni 'dir rten gyi dngos po yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ni 'dir rten gyi dngos po yin te /
translated: Therefore, it is the basis of consciousness in this context,

original: de yod na yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyang na da ltar ba kho na sa de'i rten gyi bya ba byed de /
analyzed: de yod na yod pa'i phyir ro // yang na da ltar ba kho na sa de'i rten gyi bya ba byed de /
translated: because it exists when consciousness exists.

original: de mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi 'bras bu nyid du yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi 'bras bu nyid du yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, the present is the basis of that consciousness, because it is the result of the similar and immediately antecedent condition.

original: 'das pas ni byas zin pa kho na'o //
analyzed: 'das pas ni byas zin pa kho na'o //
translated: The past is only the condition that has already performed its function.

original: de ltar na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /üîΩde la rten drug tshan ni mig la sogs pa yid la thug pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / de la rten drug tshan ni mig la sogs pa yid la thug pa'o //
translated: Thus, etc.üîΩThe six bases are the eye and so on up to the mind.

original: brten pa drug tshan ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thug pa'o //
analyzed: brten pa drug tshan ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa la thug pa'o //
translated: The six dependent phenomena are the eye consciousness and so on up to the mind consciousness.

original: dmigs pa drug tshan ni gzugs la sogs pa chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa drug tshan ni gzugs la sogs pa chos kyi khams kyi mthar thug pa'o //
translated: The six objects are form and so on up to the phenomena element.

original: 'o na ni dgra bcom pa'i zhes bya ba la tha ma ni /üîΩgang nas mtshams mi sbyor ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe /
analyzed: 'o na ni dgra bcom pa'i zhes bya ba la tha ma ni / gang nas mtshams mi sbyor ba yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe /
translated: But the final mind of an arhat does not generate a subsequent mind.

original: thams cad kyi tha ma gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad kyi tha ma gang yin pa'o //
translated: The final mind is the mind of an arhat who is about to attain nirvana and who will not reconnect to any other life.

original: de nyid la rgyu smras pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid la rgyu smras pa ni /
translated: The cause of that is stated:

original: de gang gi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de gang gi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
translated: What is the cause of that?

original: rnam par shes pa 'das ma thag pa la yid ces bya la /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa 'das ma thag pa la yid ces bya la /
translated: The immediately past consciousness is called the mind manas.

original: de gang gis 'das ma thag par 'gyur ba /üîΩdgra @42a * //
analyzed: de gang gis 'das ma thag par 'gyur ba / dgra @42a * //
translated: What causes it to be immediately past?

original: bcom pa'i sems tha ma las sems gzhan skye ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: bcom pa'i sems tha ma las sems gzhan skye ba yang ma yin no //
translated: The final mind of an arhat does not generate a subsequent mind.

original: de yang yid kyi ngo bor zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de yang yid kyi ngo bor zhes bya ba la /
translated: The root text states, ‚ÄúIt is the nature of the mind.‚Äù

original: phyi ma'i rten gyi ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir na der yid nyid ma nyams so snyam du dgongs so //
analyzed: phyi ma'i rten gyi ngo bor gnas pa'i phyir na der yid nyid ma nyams so snyam du dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that the mind does not cease because it exists as the nature of the support for the subsequent mind.

original: go 'byed pa las ni yid du 'gyur te /
analyzed: go 'byed pa las ni yid du 'gyur te /
translated: The mind is the support for the arising of consciousness.

original: mig bzhin no //
analyzed: mig bzhin no //
translated: It is like the eye.

original: ji ltar mig rten gyi ngo bor gnas la /üîΩrgyu gzhan ma tshang ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi skye ba de bzhin du /
analyzed: ji ltar mig rten gyi ngo bor gnas la / rgyu gzhan ma tshang ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa mi skye ba de bzhin du /
translated: The eye exists as the nature of the support for visual consciousness.üîΩHowever, visual consciousness does not arise because the other causes are incomplete.

original: rgyu gzhan ma tshad ba'i phyir rnam par shes ba phyi ma mi skye'o //
analyzed: rgyu gzhan ma tshad ba'i phyir rnam par shes ba phyi ma mi skye'o //
translated: In the same way, the subsequent moment of consciousness does not arise because the other causes are incomplete.

original: de la yid las mjug thogs su rnam par shes pa skye ba'i rgyu gzhan ni mthong ba'i chos kyi rnam par smin pa lhag ma dang / 'gro bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i thob pa yin no //
analyzed: de la yid las mjug thogs su rnam par shes pa skye ba'i rgyu gzhan ni mthong ba'i chos kyi rnam par smin pa lhag ma dang / 'gro bar nying mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i thob pa yin no //
translated: The other causes for the arising of consciousness immediately after the mind are the remaining karmic maturation of the present life and the obtainment of the affliction that connects one to the next rebirth.

original: dgra bcom pa'i rnam par shes pa tha ma la ni yid kyi ngo bor gnas kyang gnyis ka med pas rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi skye'o //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa'i rnam par shes pa tha ma la ni yid kyi ngo bor gnas kyang gnyis ka med pas rnam par shes pa phyi ma mi skye'o //
translated: In the final consciousness of an arhat, the mind exists as the nature of the support, but the subsequent moment of consciousness does not arise because both of those causes are absent.

original: ci ste phung po la sogs pa 'di dag las gang gis gang bsdus she na /üîΩde la phung po dag gis ni //
analyzed: ci ste phung po la sogs pa 'di dag las gang gis gang bsdus she na / de la phung po dag gis ni //
translated: If one asks, ‚ÄúWhich of these aggregates, etc. are included in which? ‚Äù,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: the root text states, ‚ÄúThe conditioned are included in the aggregates, bases, and elements. ‚Äù

original: 'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
analyzed: 'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
translated: The conditioned phenomena are included in the aggregates, bases, and elements.

original: zhes bya ba der chos 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad bsdus pas phung po dag gis ni 'dus byas thams cad bsdus so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba der chos 'dus byas zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa thams cad bsdus pas phung po dag gis ni 'dus byas thams cad bsdus so //
translated: Since all conditioned and unconditioned phenomena are included in the aggregates, all conditioned phenomena are included in the aggregates.

original: gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i //üîΩphung po 'di zhes bya ba der zag ba dang bcas pa rnams kho na bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i // phung po 'di zhes bya ba der zag ba dang bcas pa rnams kho na bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The appropriated aggregates are included in the appropriated aggregates, bases, and elements.

original: nye bar len ba'i phung po dag gis ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad bsdus so //
analyzed: nye bar len ba'i phung po dag gis ni zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad bsdus so //
translated: Since only those with outflows are included in the appropriated aggregates, all those with outflows are included in the appropriated aggregates.

original: skye mched dang khams dag gis ni chos thams cad bsdus so //
analyzed: skye mched dang khams dag gis ni chos thams cad bsdus so //
translated: All phenomena are included in the bases and elements.

original: chos thams cad kyang phung po lnga dang 'dus ma byas so //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang phung po lnga dang 'dus ma byas so //
translated: All phenomena are the five aggregates and unconditioned phenomena.

original: 'di ni re zhig rgyas pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad bsdus pa yin la /
analyzed: 'di ni re zhig rgyas pa'i sgo nas chos thams cad bsdus pa yin la /
translated: This is the inclusion of all phenomena in terms of their elaboration.

original: mdor bsdus na ni /
analyzed: mdor bsdus na ni /
translated: In brief,

original: phung po dang ni skye mched dang // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
analyzed: phung po dang ni skye mched dang // zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba yin no //
translated: the aggregates, the sense bases, and the elements.

original: dang gi sgra ni ci nas kyang gzugs kyi phung po dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi khams bsdus pa dag gis yin pa de ltar shes par bya'i /
analyzed: dang gi sgra ni ci nas kyang gzugs kyi phung po dang / yid kyi skye mched dang / chos kyi khams bsdus pa dag gis yin pa de ltar shes par bya'i /
translated: The word ‚Äúand‚Äù should be understood to mean that the form aggregate, the mind sense base, and the element of mental objects are included in the three, respectively.

original: re res yin pa de ltar shes par ni mi bya'o zhes bsdu ba'i don to //
analyzed: re res yin pa de ltar shes par ni mi bya'o zhes bsdu ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúincluded‚Äù should be understood as follows:

original: de la gzugs kyi phung pos ni gzugs can gyi khams bcu dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin no //
analyzed: de la gzugs kyi phung pos ni gzugs can gyi khams bcu dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin no //
translated: The form aggregate includes the ten physical elements and non-informative form.

original: yid kyi skye mched kyis ni sems kyi khams bdun no //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched kyis ni sems kyi khams bdun no //
translated: The mind sense base includes the seven mental elements.

original: chos kyi khams kyis ni tshar ba la sogs pa gsum dang / 'dus ma byas @42b dang ; rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o //üîΩyang ci'i phyir gsum po 'di dag kho nas yin gyi /
analyzed: chos kyi khams kyis ni tshar ba la sogs pa gsum dang / 'dus ma byas @42b dang ; rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o // yang ci'i phyir gsum po 'di dag kho nas yin gyi /
translated: The element of mental objects includes the three: the element of entities, the unconditioned, and non-informative form.

original: gzhan dag gis sam /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis sam /
translated: Why are they included in just these three and not in others,üîΩin two,

original: gnyis sam / gcig gis ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gnyis sam / gcig gis ma yin zhe na /
translated: or in one?

original: de'i phyir / bsdu ba de ni zhes rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir / bsdu ba de ni zhes rgyas par smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚ÄúThat is the collection. ‚Äù

original: gang dang gang nas byung yang rung //
analyzed: gang dang gang nas byung yang rung //
translated: From whatever source they come,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dag gis yin pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /

translated: If it were merely that, then past form would also be that which has arisen.

original: ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba de tsam zhig gis na ma 'ongs pa la yang 'gyur bas /
analyzed: ma 'gags pa zhes bya ba de tsam zhig gis na ma 'ongs pa la yang 'gyur bas /
translated: Since the future would also be so described,

original: thal bar 'gyur ba dgag pa'i phyir gnyis ka smos so //
analyzed: thal bar 'gyur ba dgag pa'i phyir gnyis ka smos so //
translated: both are mentioned in order to preclude such an absurd consequence.

original: nang gi ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa'o zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: nang gi ni rang gi rgyud la yod pa'o zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa dang / gzugs la sogs pa'o //
translated: The internal is that which exists in one's own continuum, i.e., the eyes, etc. and form, etc.

original: gzhan ni phyi'i 'o zhes ni gang zhig rang gi rgyud kyi las gzhan gyi rgyud kyi dang / rgyud du ma gtogs pa'o ;
analyzed: gzhan ni phyi'i 'o zhes ni gang zhig rang gi rgyud kyi las gzhan gyi rgyud kyi dang / rgyud du ma gtogs pa'o ;
translated: The external is that which is other than that, i.e., the eyes, etc. of another's continuum and that which is not included in a continuum.

original: / yang na skye mched kyi sgo nas so zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: / yang na skye mched kyi sgo nas so zhes bya ba la /
translated: Or, it is from the perspective of the sense bases.

original: mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched lda dang / gzugs la sogs pa phyi'i skye mched drug go //
analyzed: mig la sogs pa nang gi skye mched lda dang / gzugs la sogs pa phyi'i skye mched drug go //
translated: The internal sense bases are the eyes, etc. and the external sense bases are the six, beginning with form.

original: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa dag gzhan gyi rgyud kyi yin yang nang gi gzugs yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig la sogs pa dag gzhan gyi rgyud kyi yin yang nang gi gzugs yin la /
translated: Therefore, even though the eyes, etc. of another's continuum are external, they are internal form.

original: gzugs la sogs pa dag rang gi rgyud du gtogs kyang phyi'i yin no //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dag rang gi rgyud du gtogs kyang phyi'i yin no //
translated: And even though form, etc. included in one's own continuum are internal, they are external.

original: rags pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: rags pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa ste /
translated: The gross is that which is impeded.

original: skye mched bcu'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: skye mched bcu'i rang bzhin no //
translated: It is of the nature of the ten sense bases.

original: phra ba ni thogs pa med de /
analyzed: phra ba ni thogs pa med de /
translated: Subtle form is unimpeded.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs so //
translated: It is nonindicative form.

original: yang na ltos pa pa yin te /üîΩbil ba'i gzugs ni rags pa yin la /
analyzed: yang na ltos pa pa yin te / bil ba'i gzugs ni rags pa yin la /
translated: Or else, it is relative,üîΩbecause the form of a bilva fruit is gross,

original: skyu ru ra'i gzugs ni phra ba'o //
analyzed: skyu ru ra'i gzugs ni phra ba'o //
translated: and the form of a myrobalan fruit is subtle.

original: gal te ltos pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa ste /
analyzed: gal te ltos pa pa yin pa'i phyir ma grub pa ste /

original: rnam par gnas pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par gnas pa med do zhe na /

original: ji ltar skyu ru ra'i gzugs de nyid bil ba dang rgya shug la ltos nas phra ba dang rags pa yang yin pas cung zad phra ba dang rags par rnam par gnas par mi 'gyur te /

translated: Just as the form of a myrobalan fruit is both subtle and gross in relation to a bilva fruit and a jujube fruit, it would not be a stable state of being slightly subtle or gross.

original: pha rol dang tshu rol bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: pha rol dang tshu rol bzhin no zhe na /

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /

analyzed: ltos @44b pas tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / ltos par bya bas na ltos pa'o //
translated: because they are different due to their relation.üîΩThat which is related is a relation.

original: ltos pas na ltos pa ste /
analyzed: ltos pas na ltos pa ste /
translated: That which is related is a relation.

original: des tha dad cing ltos pas tha dad de /
analyzed: des tha dad cing ltos pas tha dad de /

original: gzhan nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: gzhan nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that they are different, or other.

original: de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: For that very reason,üîΩit is said:

original: gang la ltos te rags pa yin pa ni nam du yang de lta ltos nas phra ba ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gang la ltos te rags pa yin pa ni nam du yang de lta ltos nas phra ba ma yin te zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: ji ltar rgya shug la ltos te bil ba'i gzugs rags pa yin pa ni yang rgya shug la ltos nas phra ba ma yin pa lta bu'o //

original: pha dang bu bzhin no zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: pha dang bu bzhin no zhes bya ba la /

original: dper na lhas blangs te de nyid du bu la ltos te pha zhes brjod cing pha la ltos nas bu zhes bya la /
analyzed: dper na lhas blangs te de nyid du bu la ltos te pha zhes brjod cing pha la ltos nas bu zhes bya la /

analyzed: dge ba dang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa'o //

original: ring ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ste /
analyzed: ring ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ste /

original: phan tshun du da ltar bas chod pa'i phyir ro /üîΩnye ba ni da ltar byung ba ste /
analyzed: phan tshun du da ltar bas chod pa'i phyir ro / nye ba ni da ltar byung ba ste /

analyzed: gnyis ka dang nye ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i bar du yang de dang 'dra zhes bya ba la /
translated: The same is true for the other aggregates up to consciousness.üîΩWhatever feeling,

analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba 'am / nang gi 'am /

analyzed: phyi'i 'am / rags pa 'am / phra ba 'am /

analyzed: ngan pa 'am ; gya nom pa 'am /

original: thag ring ba na yod pa gang yin pa 'am /
analyzed: thag ring ba na yod pa gang yin pa 'am /

analyzed: nye ba na yod pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te /

analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro zhes bya bar ro //
translated: apprehends it as the aggregate of consciousness.

original: de la rags pa dang phra ba ma gtogs pa 'das pa la sogs pa rnams ni de kho na ltar bstan to ;
analyzed: de la rags pa dang phra ba ma gtogs pa 'das pa la sogs pa rnams ni de kho na ltar bstan to ;
translated: Here, the past, etc., are taught just as they are, except for gross and subtle.

original: / de nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: / de nyid kyi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: 'di ni khyad par yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par yin te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: This is the difference.

analyzed: rags pa ni dbang po lnga la brten pa'o zhes bya ba ni rten gyis rjes su byed pa'i phyir te /

analyzed: yid las srid pa ni yid las byung ba ste /

analyzed: yid kyi dbang po la rten zhes pa'i don te /

analyzed: ma bsags pa dang thogs pa med pa'i rten can yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gong ma'i sa pa ni phra ba'o // de ltar byas dang 'dod pa na @45a * //

analyzed: btsun pa zhes bya ba ni dpe ston ba gnas brtan chos skyob bo //

analyzed: dbang po lngas gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni phyi'i skye mched lnga'o //

analyzed: de yang mig la sogs pa skye mched gzugs can rnams dang / rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'o //

analyzed: ngan pa ni yid du mi 'ong ba'o zhes bya ba ni yid dang mi mthun pa'o //

analyzed: de ni yid du mi 'ong bar byed pa ma yin te /

analyzed: dga' bar byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gya nom pa ni yid du 'ong ba'o zhes bya ba ni yid dang mthun pa ste /
translated: The excellent is that which is pleasing.üîΩThat which is pleasing is agreeable to the mind.

analyzed: de ni yid du 'thad pa'i phyir yid du 'ong bar byed do ; / de ltar na dor ba'i don gyis na ngan pa yin la /

analyzed: tshim par byed pa'i don gyis na gya nom pa'o // ring ba ni yul mi snang ba can no zhes bya ba'i rten gyi yul gyi dbang du byas nas yin te /
translated: Thus, it is bad in the sense of being discarded, and it is excellent in the sense of satisfying.üîΩThe distant is that which has an invisible object.

analyzed: 'ga' zhig nye yang phra ba'i phyed mi snang bas yul smos so //

analyzed: cung zad cig nye ba yin yang chad pa'i phyer yang yul mi snang ba can du 'gyur mod kyi /

original: de'i rten de na gnas pa nyid kyis lta bar nus pas kri tya'i rkyen ni nus pa'i don la rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rten de na gnas pa nyid kyis lta bar nus pas kri tya'i rkyen ni nus pa'i don la rig par bya'o //

translated: Nearby is called ‚Äúhaving an apparent object,‚Äù but some stars and so on appear distant. Therefore he says, ‚ÄúHaving an apparent object‚Äù means that the object appears.

analyzed: yang rgyu ci'i phyir btsun pas bye brag tu smra bas bshad pa'i ring ba dang nye ba las rnam pa gzhan du ring ba dang nye bar bstan ce na /
translated: Why does the Lord teach distant and nearby in a different way from the way they are explained by the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas?

analyzed: de'i phyir 'das pa la sogs pa rang gi ming gis bstan pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba smos te /

analyzed: 'di ltar cung zad cig rang gi sgras rab tu dbye ba smras pa ni rab tu dbye ba gzhan gyi mtshan nyid las 'jug pa ma yin te /

analyzed: tha mi dad par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that it would not be different.üîΩTheir nearby and distant

analyzed: de dag gi nye ba dang ring ba dag ni zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa yul mi snang ba la brten pa ni ring ba yin la /

analyzed: yul snang ba la brten pa ni nye ba'o //

analyzed: phra ba ni yid las byung ba'o //
